name: Stuart Cowie's Rebels Racing
description: Rebel Racing is not for the faint hearted, but the adrenalin rush would equal any. Battle your way from white top to World Champion on real life tracks. Win the World Championship on all tracks to unlock the Rebels 10 Championship where a new challenge awaits. Pick from one of 15 real life drivers and select your skill level from 5 different settings. Last but not least come and say hello at NIR on the European weekend. I am taking part!
